sentences: Robert Ellis Silberstein (also known as Bob Ellis; born 1946) is an American music executive and businessman.
Silberstein was born into a wealthy family of Jewish garment manufacturers in Elberon, New Jersey.
Silberstein was married to Diana Ross from 1971 to 1977.
Rhonda was born a few months after his marriage to her mother began; Silberstein knowingly raised her as his own, and they remain close today.
In the 1970s, he managed Diana Ross; the Rolling Stones' Ronnie Wood; Billy Preston; and Chaka Khan, whom he discovered while managing Rufus.
